entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
